text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Today's my day off. While strolling<n>near the student
dormitories, I catch a<n>glimpse of a familiar face.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Hey Trainer, whatcha doin'?
choice_data_list: Just taking a walk. What about you?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Eh, not much goin' on—just killing<n>time. Can't help but feel
restless on<n>my days off.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Oh hey, I got an idea! You know what<n>would be fun? Bikes!
choice_data_list: You wanna go on a road trip?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Hell yeah! ...is what I'd like to say,<n>but I don't actually own
a motorbike<n>myself... or proper protection for that<n>matter.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Whiiich is why we're going to a<n>motorbike shop! C'mon,
let's go<n>check out the new models!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Whooooa! Trainer, check this out! It's<n>the UMAHA ZX750.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Would ya look at the size of that tank!<n>And despite the bulk,
such a<n>streamlined, modern body design! Oh<n>man, as soon
as you rev up that<n>engine, you'll become one with the<n>
wind!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Daaamn, this is awesome!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Wh-what? What's with that look?<n>I'm passionate about
bikes, okay?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
My pops is a huge fan of 'em, and<n>he'd always let me ride
on the back.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
But I guess it doesn't really matter<n>'cause I can't buy it
anyway. Just<n>like winning the Derby, it's not<n>something I
can easily get my hands<n>on.
choice_data_list: Let's get one when you win it.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Win what? You mean like, the<n>Derby?!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Whoa, whoa, whoa. So I can makemy dreams come true and get asick ride? I like the way you think!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
It's a promise between us then! I feel<n>like I can do anything
with you!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Holy crap, I'm all fired up! I can't<n>just stand still here... I'm
gonna... I'm<n>gonna...

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
I'm gonna charge straight down to<n>the beach! I may not
have my ride<n>yet... but my own two legs will do!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Raaaaargh!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Vodka sprints away at full speed, as I<n>chase her with all my
might... in a taxi.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Whew, that felt good. It's nice<n>runnin' on the road instead
of the turf<n>from time to time.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
The ocean breeze feels so good... If<n>this moment isn't the
definition of<n>cool, then I don't know what is.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Hey, Trainer, this might sound a little<n>strange, but... is there a
difference<n>between being cool and being strong?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
I've always aimed to be cool rather<n>than strong. To me,
being strong is<n>already a part of being cool.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Like, you know that time everyone<n>laughed at me 'cause I
put on airs<n>after I lost? It's been on my mind<n>ever since.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
When it comes to being cool, my pops<n>takes the cake. As
for being strong,<n>well, that's my mom.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Curious, I listen to Vodka as she<n>begins talking about her
parents.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
My pops is a biker. He didn't<n>participate in races, but we'd
always<n>go out on rides together. Thanks to<n>him, I got to go
to a bunch of different<n>places.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Pops certainly had a way with<n>words—he'd always tell me
to live my<n>life on the edge, and let my tears dry<n>in the
wind!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
But my mom was the total opposite!<n>She basically ran the
whole house,<n>and would kick Pops's butt when he<n>didn't
have his act together.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
When she ran, she was as fast as a<n>motorbike! Dirt or
pavement—she was<n>always a contender for first.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
They really are. But I always found<n>myself following in my
pops's<n>footsteps. Well, I guess it was bound<n>to happen.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Maybe it would've been better to<n>chase after my mom
instead, but I<n>just couldn't see myself doing that.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Hey, do you think I've got it all<n>wrong? Is it weird that my
goal is to<n>become the coolest?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Really? Well, if you don't think it's<n>weird, then maybe I'm
on the right<n>track after all.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Sometimes I get dumb new ideas into<n>my head, and they
just bug me,<n>y'know? Anyway, it's getting<n>late—let's
head back.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: On the way back...

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Pops used to take me on rides<n>through streets like these.
Just, like, to<n>the factory where he worked, or the<n>local
eateries and stuff.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: So it's not like we were goin' out for<n>fun. But...

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
No matter where he was heading,<n>he'd always bring me
along if I<n>wanted. All I had to do was ask.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Wha—! Don't say embarrassin' stuff<n>like that! But... I guess
you're right,<n>yeah.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
My pops shaped me into the person I<n>am today. It's thanks
to him that I'm<n>here now...

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
(I can still hear it... The exhaust pipe<n>of my pops's 250. The
warmth of the<n>arm revving the engine...)

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: No doubt about it, this is my path<n>forward. 'Cause...

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: At the end of this road lies the coolest<n>me there'll ever be!
